name: Beast of the Air (UA)

trait.name: Hit Points
text: equal the beast's Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Flyby
text: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Primal Rebirth
text: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

trait.name: Ready Companion
text: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

action.name: Shred
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 slashing damage.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Class Feature Variants p. 8
